Dreams of Marriage

A dimly lit room, two men in conversation.  
Pyotr Petrovitch looks distracted.  
Pyotr: "Damn it all! Marriage is absurd!"  

Lebeziatnikov raises an eyebrow, curious.  
Lebeziatnikov: "Why’s that?"  
Pyotr: "I’d gift my wife a lover!"  

---  

A close-up of Pyotr, animated and intense.  
Pyotr: "I love her, but respect matters!"  
Lebeziatnikov: "Interesting approach... but risky."

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Luzhin expresses a cynical view on marriage, suggesting he would encourage his wife to take a lover to maintain mutual respect.
